personal-portfolio.name: Personal Portfolio
personal-portfolio.description: A responsive personal website to showcase projects, blog posts and a contact form; includes an interactive projects gallery and CMS integration.

task-manager.name: Task Manager
task-manager.description: A productivity app with subtasks, labels, due dates and realtime collaboration via WebSockets.

weather-dashboard.name: Weather Dashboard
weather-dashboard.description: A small weather app that visualizes forecasts with charts and supports location search and offline caching.

ecommerce-store.name: E-commerce Store
ecommerce-store.description: A small online shop with product browsing, cart, checkout and stripe payments; includes admin dashboard for orders.

tech-blog.name: Tech Blog
tech-blog.description: A markdown-first blog with static generation, RSS feed and syntax-highlighted code blocks.

chat-app.name: Chat App
chat-app.description: Realtime chat with rooms, typing indicators and message persistence. Built for small team communication.

fintech-dashboard.name: Fintech Dashboard
fintech-dashboard.description: An analytics dashboard for personal finance showing income/expense charts, budgets and CSV import.

recipe-app.name: Recipe App
recipe-app.description: A social recipe platform with user-submitted recipes, search, filters and favorite lists.

travel-planner.name: Travel Planner
travel-planner.description: Trip planner with itinerary builder, maps integration and offline travel notes.

photo-gallery.name: Photo Gallery
photo-gallery.description: A performant image gallery with lazy loading, lightbox and automatic image optimization.

event-scheduler.name: Event Scheduler
event-scheduler.description: Tool for creating and managing events, RSVPs and calendar exports (iCal).

fitness-tracker.name: Fitness Tracker
fitness-tracker.description: A minimal fitness tracker with workouts, progress charts and CSV export for personal records.

learning-platform.name: Learning Platform
learning-platform.description: An educational platform with courses, progress tracking and quiz engine for instructors.

notes-app.name: Notes App
notes-app.description: Fast note-taking app with markdown support, tags and local-first sync.

kanban-board.name: Kanban Board
kanban-board.description: Drag-and-drop kanban board with persistence and shareable boards for teams.

snippet-manager.name: Snippet Manager
snippet-manager.description: Organize and search code snippets with language highlighting and sync across devices.

crypto-tracker.name: Crypto Tracker
crypto-tracker.description: Track portfolio performance with historical charts and price alerts using public APIs.

marketplace-mini.name: Marketplace Mini
marketplace-mini.description: Peer-to-peer marketplace for local sellers with search, messaging and ratings.

analytics-dashboard.name: Analytics Dashboard
analytics-dashboard.description: Real-time metrics dashboard with customizable widgets, alerts and historical reporting.
